attributes.review: This app took 10 months to download to my phone🥳 and when it finally came on to my phone my whole house got hacked by this system 😚overall just don’t get this horrid app it imploded my house 🥰🧚🧚‍♀️🧚‍♂️✨✨✨✨✨😝✌️
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I got the app and opened it the next day and instantly my heart was pumping fast, so I just went to bad. Then I had sleep peralysis and my arm was cut off and eaten by giant carrots and the TRUMP showed up and I obviously puked. Cubby chedo got mad and kept throwing the TRUMP2020 signs at me. WORST EXPERIENCE EVER. DO. OT RECOMEND. WISH I COULD GIVE A 0 STAR RATING
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Not only can I not see or do anything on it. It will not show or label anything to sign up for. It is not only hard to work but gives horrible ads

attributes.review: it took several days to download and the app itself always crashes. Somehow I keep on getting tons of ads as well. This app really is hard to use and it is very inefficient.

attributes.review: The WORST Mexican restaurant I have ever been to, the waiters spat on me and called me names, my food had a sock in it, and  this huge orange man with visible diabetes and mental issues started yelling a bunch of unintelligible racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and transphobic things. Never have I seen such a terrible restaurant
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: It look so long for to download and then when it downloaded it kept freezing my phone and then I got hacked and it messed up my whole phone I couldn’t use my phone for months😤
attributes.title: WARNING DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP when I download I ended up getting a virus that wiped all my contacts on my phone all my photos and videos are gone as well listen to the reviews guys it ruins your phone
attributes.title: My phones messed up now thanks

attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING! I opened the app and the first thing I saw was Trump’s face🤢. It hacked into my phone drained my bank account of all its money. Changed all my passwords and downloaded all sorts of dreadful and horrendous stuff onto my phone.
attributes.title: Never downloading again🤮👿😾

attributes.review: App took to long to load kept ruining my WiFi  I now have no phone the app has made my phone fly it lowkey is weird it keeps opening up random apps as well I don’t know what’s goin on right now
attributes.title: Hella pressed 😤

attributes.review: This app sends me notifications EVERY minute. Also, it logged me out of all my accounts. i am BEYOND disgusted by this app. it needs to be removed PERMANENTLY. i will NOT tolerate this type of app. shame on you guys. So, if like for this app to be removed. thank you. - abigail.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING. 😡
